1: <mistake>aus//lang</mistake> <mistake>tso'i</mistake> dga' ba <mistake>thob</mistake> pa <mistake>na//bde</mistake> ba chen po rang gis rig / de bzhin ting 'dzin dang bral <mistake>ba'i//bde</mistake> ba smra bar nus ma <mistake>yin//'gyur</mistake> med ting 'dzin thob pa <mistake>na// rnal</mistake> 'byor pa yis rang rig
2: 'gyur // 'gyur med las skyes bde rig <mistake>pa//thams</mistake> cad mkhyen <mistake>la'd</mistake> the <mistake>tom</mistake> <mistake>pa// de</mistake> lta <mistake>n</mistake> yang yid bde <mistake>min//chags</mistake> bral nyid du mi bya <mistake>'o// 'phos</mistake> pa las ni chags bral <mistake>'gyur //chags</mistake>
3: bral las ni <mistake>sprug</mistake> bsngal <mistake>'byung// sdug</mistake> bsngal skyes <mistake>bu'i</mistake> khams <mistake>zang</mistake> <mistake>byed//zad</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> las ni 'chi bar <mistake>brjod//shi</mistake> las slar yang de rnams <mistake>kyi//srid</mistake> pa'o srid las slar <mistake>'ci</mistake> 'pho // de ltar sems
4: can gyi <mistake>sring</mistake> <mistake>pa//chags</mistake> bral las <mistake>'byung</mistake> gzhan <mistake>tdu</mistake> <mistake>min// de</mistake> phyir 'bad <mistake>pa</mistake> thams cad <mistake>kyis//'pho</mistake> ba'i chags <mistake>pa</mistake> rnam <mistake>par</mistake> <mistake>spangs//gang</mistake> gis 'gyur med bde bar 'gyur // rnal 'byor 'khor <mistake>bra</mistake>
5: bcings pa <mistake>yis//'dod</mistake> ldan yang ni chags bral <mistake>par// 'dod</mistake> <mistake>pa'i</mistake> bstan bcos su mi <mistake>'dod//bdag</mistake> gis brjod pa'i rgyud du <mistake>slar//rnal</mistake> <mistake>'byor</mistake> <mistake>bcis</mistake> <mistake>snug</mistake> bsngal <mistake>'dod//khu</mistake> ba mi 'gyur rang
6: <mistake>/bzhin</mistake> <mistake>gyis//mchog</mistake> tu mi 'gyur bsgrub par <mistake>bya//rten</mistake> ni 'pho ba thob pa <mistake>n/ brten</mistake> pa'i 'dod chags bral ba <mistake>nyid//rton</mistake> dang brten pa legs rdzogs <mistake>pa //zi</mistake> srid 'gyur med nyid du <mistake>'gro//</mistake>
7: sems gyi 'gyur <mistake>medg</mistake> nyid thob <mistake>na//rten</mistake> dang brten <mistake>pa'i</mistake> mtshan nyid <mistake>med// 'gyur</mistake> med las byung sku yi <mistake>ni//mdzong</mistake> <mistake>spu'i</mistake> 'khor lor son pa'i <mistake>yang//A</mistake> <mistake>la</mistake> <mistake>k'A</mistake> <mistake>l</mistake> mnyam sbyor <mistake>ba// NTuM</mistake> yig mi <mistake>'dong</mistake> mi
8: yi bdag / stong pa las <mistake>byun</mistake> gzugs <mistake>brnhan</mistake> <mistake>rgyu//mi'</mistake> <mistake>gyur</mistake> las <mistake>sbyes</mistake> bde <mistake>ba'bras//rgyu</mistake> ni 'bras bus rgyas btab <mistake>pa//'bras</mistake> <mistake>bu'i</mistake> rgyu yis rgyas <mistake>btsab</mistake> pa'o // stong nyid gzugs <mistake>bnyan</mistake> <mistake>'djin</mistake>
